name: New Gmail without any of the annoyances
description: Increases contrast between read and unread emails to the max! Reduces wasted whitespace. Makes messages more compact. Makes the hideous black bar translucent. Replaces all icons with text. Modifications work well on most themes. You may have to tweak text colors a bit to make them stand out on extreme light backgrounds. The code is annotated so that you can change it. Change text-density to compact before you apply this style.
additional_info: You can install this style directly from Stylebot social Change text-density to compact before you apply this style. V.2: Now works for most themes. V.3: Various tweaks to make text align on the buttons V.4: Makes long threaded conversations more readable by a) dimming the crazy backgrounds a bit (you can adjust the opacity) and b) introducing color coded indents
